Topic.Title: Time to enjoy an ice cold Coke

Message.Msg: Coke with real sugar is too expensive, Reeds is much better.

Topic.Title: beverage deals inlast month/revenues expected to double in 45days

Message.Msg: I love Coke, but I'm getting nauseated by the corn syrup. And Mexican coke is too expensive. I've switched to Reeds.

Topic.Title: Will eventually be a problem for KO

Message.Msg: I haven't visited this board for years, and don't recognize anyone on it. I miss you and cancanoe's dialogs, and the Ducks thoughts. There is so much junk on yahoo, that the boards are certainly not providing any useful dialog; but they don't even produce a laugh anymore. Bill

Topic.Title: beverage deals inlast month/revenues expected to double in 45days

Message.Msg: Never heard of it but you give me the feeling that it comes with a fat helping of spam.
